RC.DescriptionEn: IF (first digit of ‘Mode of Transport at the border’ = ‘2’, ‘5’ or ‘7’) OR (Additional procedure = 615) THEN ‘Nationality of active means of transport crossing the border ’ can not be used ELSE ‘Nationality of active means of transport crossing the border ’ = ‘R’
IF the attribute 'Requested Procedure Code' = '31', '71', '76', '77' or '78' THEN this attribute = 'O' ELSE this attribute = 'R'

IF Requested procedure <>71 THEN IF 'ADDRESS.Qualifier of the Identification' = 'Z' THEN 'City' AND ‘Street and Number’ = 'R' AND ‘Postcode’ = 'O', 'Identification of Location' AND 'Additional Identifier cannot be used ELSE IF 'ADDRESS.Qualifier of the Identification' = 'X' or 'Y' THEN 'Identification of Location' AND 'Additional Identifier' = 'R', 'City' AND ‘Street and Number’ AND ‘Postcode’ cannot be used ELSE 'Identification of Location' = 'R', 'Additional Identifier' ='O', 'City' AND ‘Street and Number’ AND ‘Postcode’ cannot be used.
IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'A', 'D', 'Y' THEN this data group / data element is = REQUIRED ELSE this data group / data element is = OPTIONAL

IF 'Buyer Identification No.' OR 'Representative Identification No.' OR 'Declarant Identification No.' OR 'Exporter identification No.' OR 'Seller Identification No.' OR 'Importer Identification No.' is used THEN 'Name' and 'ADDRESS' CAN NOT BE USED ELSE 'Name' and 'ADDRESS' are REQUIRED

IF Declarant Nature code is private and IF Representative is used and Representative Nature code is private THEN address is not required
IF 'Buyer Identification No.' or 'Representative Identification No.' or 'Declarant Identification No.' or 'Exporter identification No.' or 'Seller Identification No.' or 'Importer Identification No.' is used THEN 'Name' and 'ADDRESS' cannot be used ELSE
IF Declarant Nature code is private and IF Representative is used and Representative Nature code is private THEN address is not required
else 'Name' and 'ADDRESS'= "R"
IF 'Requested procedure code' = '71' THEN this data group / data element can not be used ELSE it is Required.
IF Requested Procedure Code = '71' THEN this data item can not be used ELSE it is Optional.

IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'C', 'F' OR Requested Procedure Code = '71' THEN this data group / data item can not be used ELSE it is Optional, except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/data item imply something else.
IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'C', 'F' THEN this data group / data item can not be used ELSE it is Optional.

IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'A', 'D', AND 'Requested procedure code' = '71' THEN this data group is Required ELSE it is Optional except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/attribute imply something else.
IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'D', 'F' THEN this data group is Optional ELSE it is Required.

IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'Y' AND 'Requested procedure code' = '01', '07', '40', '43', '44', '45', '46', '48','51', '61', '68' THEN this data group / data item is REQUIRED ELSE it CAN NOT BE USED except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/attribute imply something else.

IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'A', 'D' AND 'Requested procedure code'= '71'
THEN this data group / data item is Optional
ELSE it is Required (except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/attribute imply something else)

IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'Y' AND 'Requested procedure code' = '51', '71' THEN this data group / data item can NOT BE USED ELSE it is REQUIRED except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/attribute imply something else.

IF 'additional declaration type' = 'A', 'D', 'Y' AND 'Requested Procedure code' = '51', '71' THEN this data group / data item CAN NOT BE USED ELSE it is REQUIRED except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/attribute imply something else.

IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'C', 'F' THEN this data group/element is Optional, ELSE it is Required except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/attribute imply something else.
IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'Y' THEN this data group/element is Required, ELSE it is Optional.
THEN the 'Identification number' AND 'Type of identification' cannot be used ELSE the 'Identification number' AND 'Type of identification' = 'R'
IF ‘Type of packages (code)’ indicates ‘BULK’ (UNECE rec 21 : ‘VQ’, ‘VG’, ‘VL’, ‘VY’,’VR’,'VS' or ‘VO’) THEN ‘Number of packages’ can not be used ELSE ‘Number of packages’= ‘R’
If Qualifier (of location) is X, V, location ID is required ELSE If Qualifier = Z, LocationID cannot be used ELSE LocationID is Optional
IF TraderOfficeCode is Empty or ID is Finnish personal identification number THEN 'Name' and 'ADDRESS' must be used, ELSE 'Name' and 'ADDRESS' is optional.
IF IdentificationNumber is Empty THEN TraderOfficeCode must not be used ELSE TraderOfficeCode is Optional
If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 10, 22, 23, 53, 54, 71 or 78, then previous document must be declared.
If Free form type is Invalidate then Reason for invalidation must be used else Reason for invalidation must not be used
If Free form type is Amend then Reason for amendment must be used elseReason for amendment must not be used
If Requested procedure is customs warehouse (71), THEN Authorisation is REQUIRED ELSE it it OPTIONAL

If requested procedure = 71, then if (previous procedure is 00 and declaration type is CO) or (goods location is in [FI994400, FI994900, FI998002, FI999500, FI999800, FI999801]) then previous document is optional else previous document is required else ( -> requested procedure different then 71) if (declaration type is IM, country of departure is NO and transport mode at border is 3) then previous document is optional else previous document is required

If previous procedure is ’00’ and declaration type is ‘CO’ or goods locations is one of the following: [FI994400, FI994900, FI998002, FI999500, FI999800, FI999801], THEN previous document is optional
ELSE (meaning that declaration type is ‘IM’ and goods location is something else), previous document is mandatory
If specified by the relevant 'Additional information code THEN this data element is REQUIRED ELSE it can NOT be USED
IF ((Declaration is lodged by private person) AND (Mode of transport at the border is mail (5) THEN Trader reference number (LRN) is OPTIONAL ELSE it is REQUIRED
IF Previous Document Type is = 337 or 355 THEN data element is Required
IF the attribute 'Requested Procedure Code' = '31', '71', '76', '77' or '78' THEN this attribute = 'O' ELSE this attribute = 'R'
If dataset type is H1, H5E or H7, then if Warehouse exists it is not used, else required (or as other conditions apply). If dataset type is different, then not used.

IF Declaration is lodged by private person, THEN data element is OPTIONAL ELSE //C0010 IF (first digit of ‘Mode of Transport at the border’ = ‘2’, ‘5’ or ‘7’) OR (Additional procedure = 615) THEN ‘Nationality of active means of transport crossing the border ’ can not be used ELSE ‘Nationality of active means of transport crossing the border ’ is Required
If Type of location is B or C, Economic operator (function "EO") can be used else cannot be used
If Type of location = C, function="Authorisation" can be used ELSE function="Authorisation" cannot be used
If Type of location is is A, C or D, location "Address" can be used ELSE If Type of location = B , Location "Address" cannot be used
If Dataset type is H2, I2 or Mean of transport at the border is 3 then Customs Office can be used (optional), else cannot be used
If additional information code FITAK is used, credit direct representative (status code 2) must be declared.
If dataset type is H7, then this is required, else it is used.
If dataset type is H7, then this is not used, else it is optional.
If dataset type is H7, then this is optional, else it is not used.
If dataset type is H7, then this is optional, else it is required.
If dataset type is POR and additional information code FIFIX is not used on each goods item, then this is required, else not used.

IF additional procedure code is 607 for each goods item THEN not used ELSE IF (Add. procedure is 648 for each goods item) AND (Additonal information code FIFIX exists on each goods item) THEN cannot be used ELSE it is required

IF Declaration is lodged by private person (Declarant or (both Declarant and representative)) THEN data item is NOT REQUIRED ELSE IF TraderOfficeCode is Empty THEN data item is REQUIRED ELSE cannot be used
IF Additional procedure 615 or F15 THEN data item can NOT be USED ELSE data item is REQUIRED
IF (Requested procedure = 71) OR ( Additional procedure = 615) THEN data item can NOT be USED ELSE data item is OPTIONAL
Not used for I1, H2, H5N, optional for H5E, else required
IF Requested procedure = 71 THEN data item is REQUIRED ELSE data item is OPTIONAL
IF Additional procedure = 615 THEN data item is OPTIONAL ELSE data item can NOT be USED
IF (Requested procedure = 71) OR ( Additional procedure = 615) THEN data item can NOT be USED ELSE data item is OPTIONAL
Not used for H2, H5, I1, else required
Not used for H5, optional for other datasets
Not used for H2, H5N, I1, else required (or as other conditions apply)
If dataset type is H5N then this is not used, else required.
Not used for H5N, optional for other datasets
IF H5 FI THEN data item can NOT be USED ELSE IF I1 THEN Optional ELSE data item is REQUIRED"
Not used for H2 and H5 National, required for all the other datasets (or as other conditions apply)
IF Requested procedure <>71 and Additional procedure 615,F15 THEN data item is OPTIONAL ELSE data item can NOT be USED
IF Additional procedure = 615 THEN data item is OPTIONAL ELSE data item is REQUIRED
IF Additional procedure = 615 THEN data item is REQUIRED ELSE data item can NOT be USED
IF I1 or H5N, THEN cannot be used, ELSE = R
IF (H5 FI) or H2 THEN data item can NOT be USED ELSE IF H5 EU and declaration lodged by private person THEN OPTIONAL ELSE REQUIRED
If Dataset type H2 or H5N or Addtl. Declr. Type C or F, then not used, else required (or as other conditions apply)
IF TraderOfficeCode does not exists THEN data item is REQUIRED ELSE cannot be used
IF ID number exists THEN optional ELSE cannot be used
IF H5 (EU or FI) THEN data group can NOT be USED ELSE REQUIRED

If dataset type is H5N then this is not used, else if (dataset type is H1 or H7, declaration is lodged by private person (importer + representative) and additional procedure C08 is used) OR (dataset type is H5E) then this is optional, else it is required.

IF Requested Procedure code = 71 or exists Additional procedure = 615 THEN data item can NOT be USED ELSE IF 'Additional declaration type' = {'A', 'D', 'Y'} THEN this data group / data element is REQUIRED ELSE this data group / data element is OPTIONAL
IF Requested procedure =71 THEN REQUIRED ELSE IF exists Add procedure 615 THEN can NOT be USED ELSE OPTIONAL

IF Requested Procedure code = 71 THEN data item can NOT be USED ELSE IF 'Additional declaration type' = {'A', 'D', 'Y'} THEN this data group / data element is REQUIRED ELSE this data group / data element is OPTIONAL
If Dataset type is H2 or H5 (both E/N) then not used, else if (requested procedure is 42 or 63) or (additional procedure F48 is used) then required, else it is optional.

IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'C', 'F' THEN this data group/element is OPTIONAL ELSE it is REQUIRED except where additional conditions or rules for the same data group/attribute imply something else.

IF the declaration is lodged by private person THEN IF exists Additional procedure code C08, B02, B03 THEN NationalAdditionalCode ("Q" code) is OPTIONAL ELSE THEN NationalAdditionalCode ("Q" code) is REQUIRED (it should be declare at least one of them) ELSE (declarant is a company) IF importer is not VAT registered, THEN NationalAdditionalCode ("Q" code) are REQUIRED ELSE NationalAdditionalCode ("Q" code) is OPTIONAL ENDIF ENDIF
If declaration is H2 dataset or declaration type is different than A, B, C, then cannot be used, else optional.
If Item charge is bigger than 0 (zero), item charge currency unit must be used. Otherwise it is optional.

IF Declaration is lodged retrospectively except Dataset H1 (Additional procedure code is 680 AND DutyTaxFee/ElectedEntry is declared) THEN this data group/element is optional, else it is required (or as other conditions suggest).

IF Declaration is lodged retrospectively (Additional procedure code is 680 AND DutyTaxFee/ElectedEntry is declared) THEN this data group/element is not used, else required (or as other conditions suggest)

IF Declaration is lodged by private person AND (H1 or H5 EU) AND Declaration was lodged retrospectively (Additional procedure code is 680 AND DutyTaxFee/ElectedEntry is declared) THEN this data group/element is Optional
ELSE
//C0628
IF 'Additional declaration type' = 'D', 'F' .
THEN this data group is Optional
ELSE it is Required
If preferential code indicating quota [x20, x25, x28] THEN Quota order number = R, ELSE cannot be used.
IF Preference code starts with 2,3,4 then Country of preferential origin required, else optional

If declaration dataset is H1 or H7, additional procedure code F48 is used and valid IOSS number of vendor is given in Additional fiscal trader reference group with role FR5, then VAT rate code (NationalAdditionalCode beginning with Q) is optional, else as other conditions (NC0229) apply.
If dataset type is H5 (both H5N and H5E), or H7 (low value consignment) and additional procedure F49 is used, representative must exist

New implementation based on UTUK-1391 referring UTU Internal User Interface Specification Part 2, page:
IF FI414A/Invalidation/FreeFormInvalidationReason = D THEN ReplacingMRN is Required ELSE IF FI414A/Invalidation/FreeFormInvalidationReason = V THEN ReplacingMRN is Optional ELSE ReplacingMRN is NotUsed

IF FI414A/Invalidation/FreeFormInvalidationReason in (E,U) THEN Text is Required ELSE IF FI414A/Invalidation/FreeFormInvalidationReason = V THEN IF declaration was lodged by private person THEN Text is optional ELSE Text is Required ELSE Text is optional
IF (Declaration is lodged by private person AND inland mode of transport = 5 (mail) THEN this data group / data element (Trader reference number) is OPTIONAL ELSE it is REQUIRED
IF (Declaration is lodged by private person AND inland mode of transport = 5 (mail) THEN this data group / data element is OPTIONAL ELSE it is REQUIRED

IF (Declaration is lodged by private person) THEN data item cannot be used ELSE required
//Definition for private person will change - Importer or both Importer and Representative
If function is Supporting document, then Identifier is required. If function is Additional reference, then Identifier is not used.
IF Condition=XXX(Other), then LocationName = R

If the goods are packaged together in such a way that it is impossible to determine the gross mass of the individual items, then gross mass is entered on declaration level. -> If Total gross mass exists on header level, then cannot be used on goods items level, else must be used on each goods items
If function is Additional document, then this element is optional, if function is Additional reference, this element is not used.
If Additional information code FIJAE exists (indicating split declaration), DutyTaxFee/ElectedEntry must be declared
If declaration is lodged by private person, buyer cannot be declared.

If dataset type is H5N then if importer is not VAT-registered then this is required, if importer is VAT registered this is not used. Optional (or as other rules and conditions apply) for other datasets.
If dataset type is H5N and importer is VAT-registered then this is required, else optional or as other conditions apply
If dataset type is H5N then not used, else optional
If dataset type is H5N and declarant is VAT-registered then this is optional, for VAT not registered it is not used. For other datasets optional or as other conditions apply
If dataset type is H5N then this is required, else optional
H5N: ElectedEntry (VAT Period date) is required for H5N
If previous document type is 355 from UTU Entry, then data element is Required
If repayment method is cash then not used, else required.
If repayment method is Non-IBAN then required, else not used
If repayment method is IBAN then required, else not used
If the change request is initiated by other authoity, this is required, else cannot be used
If change request is initiated by trader, then this element is required, else not used.
Amount in supplementary measure unitis is required by TARIC codelist

Implementation based on UTUK-1391 referring UTU Internal User Interface Specification Part 2, page IF IB914A/ChangeRequest/Reason = D THEN ReplacingMRN is Required ELSE IF IB914A/ChangeRequest/Reason = V THEN ReplacingMRN is Optional ELSE ReplacingMRN is NotUsed
IF this data item different to D.E. '3/18 - declarant identification No.' THEN it is REQUIRED ELSE it can NOT BE USED
If authorisation type is CWP, authorisation holder id and the identification number of the declarant must be the same
If representation status is 3 (indirect representation) then authorisation type must be CW1 or CW2 (authorisation type CWP for private warehouse is not allowed)
If requested procedure = 71 and additional procedure is F31, previous procedure must be 21
If requested procedure = 71 and additional procedure is F32, previous procedure must be 51
If requested procedure = 71 and additional procedure is F34, previous procedure must be 44

If declaration is standard customs declaration and previous procedure is 21, then if case is customs warehousing declarations (requested procedure 71), previous document type must be type one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ, else the previous document type must be one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ or 781.

If previous procedure is 44, previous document must be declared with type 'IM' (national previous document type) and as reference is case identification number of end use declaration (and import must be found from other customs clearance system)
If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 51m then previous document type must be one of IM, 821 or ZZZ.

If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and requested procedure is 40, 42, 61, 63 or 71, then if commodity code starts with 8701 - 8705, additional information code FIXBC (and vehicle identification number (VIN) / chassis number as a value for it) must be declared.
If qualifier identification (of location) is X, trader identification number and trader office code must be declared in LocationID
If declaration is low value consignment (FI485A), sum value of declared goods cannot be over 150€.
If declaration is low value consignment (FI485A), sum value of declared goods cannot be over 150€.

If declaration is low value consignment (FI485A) or customs declaration (FI415A) with dataset type H5 and additional procedure F49, sum value of declared goods cannot be over 150€. If the case is H7 and IOSS valid (additional procedure F48 and valid additional fiscal trader reference with role FR5), the limit is 155€ (configurable in T2config).
If location address has been declared, country code must be FI (at least in the CW pilot)
All goods items must have the same value
All goods items must have the same value

If previous procedure is 71 THEN there MUST be declared one of the following previous documents: - type ZZZ and reference to customs warehousing SAD - type MRN and customs warehousing MRN (in UTU) - type 821 and transit MRN

If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 00, then if case is customs warehousing declarations (requested procedure 71), previous document type must be type one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ, else the previous document type must be one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ or 781.
If authorisation type is CW1, warehouse type must be R
If authorisation type is CW2, warehouse type must be S
If authorisation type is CWP, warehouse type must be U
If authorisation type is CW2, authorisation holder id and the identification number of the declarant must be different

In case the value of 'Number of Packages' is ‘0’ then there should exist at least one goods item with the same 'Shipping marks' and 'Type of packages', and 'Number of Packages' with value greater than ‘0’
If requested procedure is 71, there must be one of the following authorisation types (3/39): CWP, CW1, CW2
It is not allowed to declare the same authorisation type more than once
There must not be more than one declared customs warehousing authorisation (CWP, CW1 or CW2)
There must be exactly one GoodsShipment.
IF user is not ADM (advanced declaration maintenance) THEN Previous document must not exist
Must be greater than zero

IF trader is EU or Non-EU Private person (Role "C" or "P") THEN format of ID must be CountryCode + DDMMYY
Remark: the rule is currently switched off - a new definition due to CR 109 should be implemented
Must start with a two digit country code (EU or non-EU - CL008)
If the format of the trader id is FI + 9 characters, then modulus validation of Finnish EORI id must be performed. Format must be 'FI' + 7 digits + hyphen + check sum digit

If the format of the trader id is FI + 11 characters, then modulus validation of Finnish personal identification number must be performed.
Format must be
'FI' + 6 digits + hyphen
or
'A' + 3 digits + check sum character

If the format of the trader id is FI + something else than above mentioned options, then modulus validation of Finnish non-EU country EORI id (e.g. FINO1705121302001) must be performed. Format must be 'FI' + non-EU country code + 13 digits (which must be yymmddHHMMnnn)
The trader id must always be EU-country EORI: 'FI' + 7 digits + hyphen + check sum digit or non-FI and EORI verified in EOS.
If qualifier identification (of location) is V, type of location must be A and value of location ID must be valid customs office ID (code list CustomsOffice)
Representative ID cannot be amended
If qualifier identification (of location) is X, type of location must be B or C
If qualifier identification (of location) is Z, type of location must be A or C or D
Estimated presentation of goods date and time cannot be amended after release.
Atleast one of notification text, or provided information must be present.
Atleast one of Description, document link must be present.
Additional declaration type cannot be amended
Representative ID cannot be amended
Requested procedure cannot be amended
Service provider has to be differnet from importer, declarant and representative.
Service provider has to be differnet from declarant and representative
Service provider has to be differnet from declarant and representative

Logged user must be in only one role in declaration. Roles: service provider, declarant (importer in case of H5N) or representative (except case of indirect representation, when declarant is indirect representative)
As a Trader creating amendment requirest I want to be sure that amendment request contain at least some change so that there are no change requests without really containin change in data of case.
For EIDR, there must be one of the following authorisation types (3/39): CWP, CW1, CW2
For EIDR, there must be authorisation type (3/39): EIR
Declaration cannot be amended if there is pending control which has been notified to trader
If declaration type is CO, then country of dispatch/export must be an EU country. If declaration type is IM, then country of dispatch/export must not be an EU country.
Representative must be a Finnish company or a Finnish private person

If representative is a private person, then declarant and importer must be a private person as well. If representative does not exist and declarant is a private person, then importer must be a private person as well.
Declaration cannot be amended if there is pending control which has been notified to trader
Declaration cannot be amended, if there is pending control
If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 53, then if previous document type must be one of IM, 821 or ZZZ.

If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 10, then if case is customs warehousing declarations (requested procedure 71), previous document type must be type one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ, else the previous document type must be one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ or 781.

If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 22, then if case is customs warehousing declarations (requested procedure 71), previous document type must be type one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ, else the previous document type must be one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ or 781.

If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 23, then if case is customs warehousing declarations (requested procedure 71), previous document type must be type one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ, else the previous document type must be one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ or 781.
If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 54, then the previous document type must be one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952 or ZZZ.
If declaration is standard customs declaration (FI415A) and previous procedure is 54, then the previous document type must be one of 337, 355, 820, 821, 952, ZZZ or 781.
If requested procedure is 71 (customs warehousing), then location type code must be B - authorised place.
All previous documents in the declaration must be from the same procedure group
If requested procedure is 42 or 63, then Identification number must a Finnish EORI
When previous procedure is 53, there must be declared additional information code 00900; else it cannot be declared.
When previous procedure is 51, there must be declared additional information code 00700; else it cannot be declared.
Combination of requested, previous and additional procedure must be correct according to the codelist.
It is forbiden to combine both F15 and 615 Additional procedure codes in the same customs declaration
If dataset type is H5 (both H5EU and FI), additional declaration type must be A
Either UN/LOCODE for the location or the country code as provided for D.E. 3/1 Exporter followed by the name of the location is required
IF Requested Procedure is = 42 or 63 THEN this value must be FR2 ELSE If Addtl. procedure code F48 exists on all goods items, THEN this value must be FR5
Check whether the dataset of a given declaration is a valid dataset type implemented for customs declarations
Check whether the dataset of a given declaration is a valid dataset type implemented for reduced declarations
Check whether the dataset type in the amended declaration is the same as the one in the corresponding input declaration
Check whether the declaration type in the amended declaration is the same as the one in the corresponding input declaration
Check whether the declaration type of the H5N / H5E declarations is "CO"
The corresponding date must not be newer than today's dayte, midnight (< tomorrow 0:00:00)
NationalAdditionalCode, if used, must exist in Arvonlisa codelist
IF "Container" = "1" THEN this must be present on Consignment level or at GI level ELSE it cannot be used
If Addtl. procedure F48 exists on all goods items, Role of Domestic Duty Tax Party must be FR5
If declaration is lodged under procedure 42 or 63, the trader declared under Additional Fiscal Trader Reference cannot be finnish - must not begin with "FI"

For retrospectively lodged cases, ElectedEntry must be in the past and maximally one year old for private persons, maximally five years old for companies. For H5N, ElectedEntry must be maximum 30 days (one month) in the past, today or maximum 30 days (one month) in the future. For split declarations (additional information code FIJAE used), ElectedEntry must be maximum 30 days (one month) in the past or today.
AdditionalInformation / Description string can be converted to Decimal value
If declaration is lodged by private person, requested procedure must be 40, 61 or 71.
If declaration is lodged by private person, previous procedure must be 00, 21 and 71.

Buyer ID cannot be in format of EU or Non-EU or Finnish personal identification number.
Remark: the rule is currently switched off - a new definition due to CR 109 should be implemented
Either Economic Operator, Authorization number, Customs Office or Address must be used in goods location.

If requested procedure is different than 71 and representation status is 2 (direct) or 1 (self - no representative is used), then declarant identification number and importer identification number must be the same.
If dataset type is H7, only VAT codes (starting with "Q") can be used
If declaration is postal (mode of transport = 5) and additional declaration type is D, previous document must be 355.
If dataset type is H5 (both H5N and H5E) or H7 (low value consignment) and additional procedure F49 is used, representative with credit trader status must exist.
If the seconds or milliseconds are used in this element, they will be ignored.
If Origin group exists, country of origin (generalOrigin - OC) is required

If dataset type is H1 with requested procedure 40 and additional procedure C07 is used, then sum of goods items invoice value must be less than or equal to 150€. If such case is IOSS valid (additional procedure F48 and valid additional fiscal trader reference with role FR5), the liimt is 155€ (configurable in T2config).
IF(H5 (both FI & EU) or H7) THEN IF (Additional Procedure code = C08) THEN Item price must be =< 45 euro Importer role must be private person ENDIF ENDIF

IF (H1 and (Requested procedure = 40) THEN IF (Additional Procedure code = C08) THEN Item price must be =< 45 euro Statistical value must be =< 45 euro Nature of transaction must be 30 Importer role must be private person ENDIF ENDIF

IF (Requested procedure = 61) and case is lodged by private person THEN IF ((H1 and (TARIC code declared)) OR (H5 (both FI & EU) and (Additional Procedure code = B03)) THEN Additional information code must start with "FI" and contains description OR Additional document code N830 and export MRN must be declared ENDIF ENDIF

IF (H1 or H5 (both FI & EU)) and (Requested procedure = 61) THEN IF (((H1 and (TARIC code declared)) OR (H5 (both FI & EU)) and (Additional Procedure code = B02 or 670)) THEN Additional information code must start with "FI" and contains description OR Additional document code N830 and export MRN must be declared
ENDIF ENDIF
Postal ID must be unique
Postal ID must be unique
If declaration is lodged retrospectively, additional declaration type must be A.
Previous document 781 for postal declaration cannot be amended, goods item cannot be removed
There must be exactly one GoodsShipment.

IF declaration is lodged retrospectively (DutyTaxFee/ElectedEntry is in the past; does not apply for H5N and split declarations (additional info code FIJAE)) THEN Additional procedure code 680 must be declared (in every goods item) ELSE Additional procedure code 680 cannot be declared
IF Additional procedure code F48 is declared THEN Q... code is Optional ELSE is Required
IF Code = FIJAE, THEN Description must be a valid UTU import MRN (second last difgit is R or V) in state registered or accepted
if requested procedure 42 or 63, then non-FI EU-country, ELSE FI
If Representation status = 3 (indirect), then Identification number must be the same as in group Declarant. Not applicable for dataset H5N.
FIPRE cannot be used if a quota order number is not entered
Either (Amount + Amount currency) or (Quantity + Quantity Unit) must be used, but not both
If Additional fiscal reference identification role is FR5, Identification number must be valid IOSS number
If requested procedure is 42/63, declared additional fiscal trader reference (role FR1, FR2, FR3 or FR7) must be valid in VIES.
If additional procedure code F49 is declared, then importer must be a private person (Role C, P or H).
If additional procedure code F48 and additional fiscal trader reference with role FR5 are declared, then Importer must be a private person (Role C, P or H).
If dataset type is H5N, Requested procedure is always 40 or 61 and Previous procedure can be 00, 21 or 71.
If dataset type is H5N and importer is not VAT registered, VAT code must be declared in this group in correct form (Code FIALK + appropriate Q... code in description)
If dataset type is H5N and importer is VAT registered, VAT code must be declared in this group in correct form (Code FIALK + appropriate Q... code in description)

If (submissionTime from serviceOfNotificationDate > 3 years and reason in B, C, I, J, T, X) OR (submissionTime from serviceOfNotificationDate > 1 year AND reason in F), then the request will be rejected
Change request must have either reason text or actual changes in declaration data.
If original declaration requested procedure in (01, 10, 11, 21, 22, 23, 31, 43, 61, 63, 68, 71, 76, 77, 95, 96) and amended requested procedure is different, change request will be rejected.

IF original declaration requestedProcedure in (07, 42, 44, 45, 46, 48, 51, 53) AND amended requestedProcedure is different THEN IF amended requestedProcedure is not 40 THEN Change request will be rejected

IF original declaration requestedProcedure is 40 AND amended requestedProcedure is different, THEN IF amended requestedProcedure is not in (07, 42, 45, 61)
THEN change request will be rejected
If declaration is currently waiting for Rahje ClearanceCaseNotificationReceipt or Rahje Billing details, it is not possible to amend the case.
EMCS: The details of the registered consignor could not be found
EMCS: The authorisation to act as a registered consignor is not valid
EMCS: The registered consignor does not hold an authorisation for all the declared goods
EMCS: Technical error during EMCS validation
EMCS: The excise number of the registered consignor is missing or invalid
EMCS: The excise number of the registered consignee is missing or invalid
EMCS: The product group code must be provided
Requested state must be in enum eStateChangeRequest

Check whether the (current) date/time of lodging low-value declaration is less then a defined value (cT2ConfigBusiness, lodging_lvc_allowed_date). If YES, return Rule.Unsatisfied --> impossible to lodge the case. Otherwise return Rule.Satisfied and the case can be lodged.
Commodity code (a 6-digit HS code or an 8-digit CN code or a 10-digit Taric code) must be valid in Taric on the acceptance date

If combined nomenclature code has been declared, harmonised system code must exist as well. If also Taric code has been declared, both combined nomenclature code and harmonised system code must exist.
If Taric requires additional code(s) for commodity code, then it (all required) must be declared
If Taric requires national additional code(s) for commodity code, then it (all required) must be declared
If Taric requires condition code(s) for commodity code, then it (all required) must be declared by using additional information code FIXAN
If condition code has been declared, then corresponding additional document must be declared
If Taric requires supplementary unit(s) for commodity code, then it (all required) must be declared
If Taric requires supplementary unit qualifier(s) for commodity code, then it (all required) must be declared
If Dataset type is not H2 and declarant is not VAT Registered, then National additional code Q... must be used
Only 1 National additional code Q... can be used
If change request does not exists (no GUID provided, change type must be "M" (Invalidation). If change request exists (GUID is provided), change type can be "M" or "O" (Amendment after release).
Not allowed for datset H2, I2
On amendment request messages (currently IB431A, IB432A, IB931A), change type must be "O" (AmendmentAfterRelease).
Additional procedure must be 607 or 615 for all goods items and they cannot be combined
IF exists Additional procedure 607 THEN Declaration type shall be "IM" ELSE IF exists Additional procedure 648 THEN Declaration type shall be "IM" or "CO"
IF exists Additional procedure 607 THEN Additional Declaration type shall be "A" or "D" ELSE IF exists Additional procedure 648 THEN Declaration type shall be "A"
Authorisation must be valid on the acceptance date (must be found in Authorisation register using that date and authorisation id)
Authorisation type must be the same in the declaration and in authorisation details
Authorisation holder ID must be the same in the declaration and in the authorisation details (applicant)
If geographical coverage is specified in the authorisation details, there has to be FI Finland. Authorisation can be issued by other EU country
If commodity codes are specified in the authorisation details, they have to match to declared commodity codes
Declared warehouse id must be listed in the authorisation details
For authorisation types CWP, CW1 and CW2: GRN (8/6) must not be empty in the authorisation details
For authorisation type EIR: There must be procedure 71 in the authorisation details (7/2)
Declared warehouse id must be listed in the authorisation details
Declared warehouse id must be listed in the authorisation details
If starts with FI + some 3. country code like RU or NO (3. country EORI registration made in Finland), must be found from trader register even without trader office code.
If trader is EORI registered in Finland, trader ID with the type 'EORI' is same as declarants's identifier
If trader office code is declared, the trader must be valid in Customs trader register
If trader office code is declared, the specified trader office must be valid in Customs trader register
If representation status is 3 (indirect representation) then representative must be found from Trader register even without trader office code
If representation status is 3 (indirect representation) then there must be a flag for indirect representation in the trader details of the representative
Must be verified EORI trader
Service provider has to be registered as service provider in trader register
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
Country code in the address of the warehouse must be FI (country code in the warehouse identification can be something else when the authorisation has been issued in another EU country)
Warehouse type must be same in the declaration and in warehouse details.
Control with parameter"Inform Trader" must exist for manually created control notification
Manual control notification is not possible for D, if it’s not accepted yet and informTrader = 2
Only 1 manual control notification can exist for each measure
Date must be in future, max 3 years from current datetime
Quota order number must be valid for Accceptnce date
Service charge for declaration od goods item must be entered
Additional code of service charge must be unique
Additional code of service charge must be unique for the whole declaration
If additional code is used on goods item, it cannot be used on header
If additional code is used on header, it cannot be used on goods item
Goods item number must be unique
Quota request must be in state New
Only one of them can be true: ask for sending secured liability notification OR release liabilities OR recalculate secured liability; not two or three of them.
Only one of them can be true, the others must be false
Control location form VALVON must exist
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
Declared procedure code must match to the returned procedure code (previous procedure declared now must be the same as requested procedure in the preceeding procedure)
If previous procedure is 71, then additional declaration type must be different than 'D'.
IF there is at least one Previous document type "IM" THEN Additional declaration type D cannot be used
If selected type is ”IM”, format must be 17 digits without spaces or any other characters
If selected type is ”MRN”, format must be UTU format: 18 characters starting with year and ”FIU” etc.
If selected type other value then IM, MRN, ZZZ or 781, format must be generic MRN: 18 characters starting with year and country and then digits and letters and check sum in the end
For declaration types D, E, F only one type of previous declaration types is allowed
For declaration types D, E, F only one type of previous declaration types is allowed
If Previous document type is IM or MRN, then Previous procedure must be the same as requested procedure on previous document

If selected type is ”781”, format must be either Posti - 13 characters: in the beginning and end 2 letters, or Åland post - 11 characters: in the beginning letters AN and in the end letters AX or 21 characters: in the beginning JJFI and 17 numbers.
Max length oz ZZZ document is 18 characters

If means of transport at the border is mail (5), then previous document must be of type 781, 355, 821 or ZZZ, there must be exactly one repetition of the document with this type on each goods item and they must have the same reference.
Previous document must be unique for goods item
Previous document must be unique for goods item
Post charges cannot be declared both in Additional infrotmation FIALM and Charge type 3A
1A = additions using unclassified amount / 2A = deductions using unclassified amount: cannot be used if amount >= 20 000€
Charge type 6x Tobacco retail price can be used only with AdditionalProcedure C08
FIALM code is not allowed, should be entered as ChargeType 3A
If requested procedure is 07 or 45 and Additional procedure F06 than Goods item Additional infromation code FIXFC must exist
If requested procedure is 07 or 45 and Additional procedure F06 then Header Additional information code FIXFA must exist
Charge type must be unique for Goods item
Declaration cannot be amneded before release if requested procedure is 07 or 45 and Additional procedure is F06
Given MRN must be valid.
If Representative is used, then authorization holder must not be the same as Representative
Valid MRN format
Submiter ID must be the same as for declarant, representative or service provider in the original/amended declaration.
Submiter ID must be the same as for declarant, representative or service provider in the original/amended declaration.
The case needs to have subsequent cases in order to be discharged.
Authorisation holder ID must be the same as for declarant
If exists additional procedure code 150, then there must be declared additional document of type C601 in the corresponding goods item.

If requested procedure is different than 71, previous procedure is 21, and declaration is not lodged from TUTTU, then there must exist either: - additional document type C019, or - additional information code FISAP.
If Requested procedure is 61 and Previous procedure is 21 then if declaration is not lodged by private person, either Additional document type = C710 or Additional information code = FIOEI
If requested procedure is different than 71 and previous procedure is 21, then nature of transaction (8/5) must be one of 21, 22, 51, 52, 60.
If requested procedure is different than 71 and previous procedure is 21, then preference (4/17) must be 100.
If additional procedure B02 is declared and declaration is not lodged from TUTTU, then there must be declared additional information code FITAC on corresponding goods item.
If additional information code 00800 is declared, then there also must exist additional information code 00700.
If Additional information code is 00100, then Additional Declaration type must be A or D.
If additional information code is FIPRE, then previous procedure must be 21 and requested procedure must be either 61, 63 or 68.
If additional information codes 00100 (header level) and FIARE (item level) are declared, then Importer must be finnish or EU private person (C, H).
If additional procedure code 204 or 205 is declared, then export country must exist in codelist Codelist;UnderAgreementForPreference.
If additional procedure code 204 or 205 is used, then nature of transaction (8/5) must be 60 and preference (4/17) must be 100.
If additional procedure code 204 or 205 is used, then additional information code FIUKV must exist on corresponding goods item.
If previous procedure is 51 and additional procedure code 160 is declared, then additional document type C601 must exist on the corresponding goods item.
If previous procedure is 53 and additional procedure code 160 is declared, then additional document type C516 must exist on the corresponding goods item.
If previous procedure is 71 and additional procedure code 160 is declared, then there must exist additional document of type either C517, C518 or C519 on corresponding goods item.
If requested procedure is 61, 63 or 68, previous procedure is 21 and additional procedure code 160 is declared, then additional document type C019 must exist on the corresponding goods item.
‘Goods Item Number’ is always used even if ‘Items’ = ‘1’, ‘Goods Item Number’ is also ‘1’.

Each ‘Goods Item Number’ is unique throughout the declaration. The items shall be numbered in a sequential fashion, starting from '1' for the first item and incrementing the numbering by '1' for each following item".
A zero '0' is to be considered as a valid number in this field.
The total number of packages is equal to the sum of all ‘Number of packages’ + a value of ‘1’ for each declared ‘bulk’.
When a detail is common to all goods items, it must be declared at declaration header level. The details are declared at goods item level only if they differ from each other.
This information is to be provided where the buyer is different to the person provided in D.E. 3/15 Importer
This information is to be provided where the seller is different to the person provided in D.E. 3/1 Exporter
Declarant ID cannot be amended
If information is required but does in fact not exist, N/A shall be used.
MRN must exist in UTU
Measure cannot be finisthed, if Quota request has not been sent yet
Measure Control phase 5, cannot be created manually
Measure cannot be finisthed, until a notification message about secured liability is sent
Control with status New or Response delayed must exist to be send.
Additional remarks to inspector can be changed till control assignment is send to VALVON
Abnormal control location can be changed until measure is finished
Instructions to trader can be changed until control results are received from VALVON or saved by officer
Measure for movement permit is not possible to finish before control notification is sent to the trader
If additional information code FITAK is used, credit direct representative (status code 2) must be declared.

If transaction channel is message exhange, requested procedure is different than 71 and representation status is either 1 (self representation/no representative exists) or 2 (standard direct representation without code FITAK), then declarant must be a credit trader.

If transaction channel is message exchange, requested procedure is different than 71 and representation status is either 2 with additional code FITAK (direct representative providing the guarantee) or 3 (indirect representative), then representative must be a credit trader.
Discharge cannot be done, because on the requested declaration (or one of the declarations), there is currently ongoing electronic request for amendment.
Location type must exist on declaration
